snippet: Late-night TV satirists are setting up shop in Cleveland and Philadelphia at the G.O.P. and Democratic conventions....
abstract: Five late-night comedy talk shows from competing networks plan to air special live episodes from Republican and Democratic National Conventions; each hopes to distinguish itself from similar shows in crowded television genre.
lead_paragraph: Late-night TV satirists are setting up shop in Cleveland and Philadelphia at the G.O.P. and Democratic conventions.

headline.main: Live, From Cleveland! Late-Night Comics Stake Their Turf at Conventions
headline.print_headline: Clinton or Trump? How About Maher or Colbert?
